subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After Chelsea cruised to a win at M.K. Dons to reach the fifth round of the F.A. Cup, Terry, the team’s captain, said Chelsea had told him it would not be renewing his contract.
snippet: After Chelsea cruised to a win at M.K. Dons to reach the fifth round of the F.A. Cup, Terry, the team’s captain, said Chelsea had told him it would not be renewing his contract.
